Rules.Expression: (newParticipant.ReasonForRemoval != RDI OR newParticipant.ReasonForRemoval != RDR OR newParticipant.ReasonForRemoval != RPR) AND (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(newParticipant.Postcode) OR !DbLookupValidationBreastScreening.ValidateOutcode(newParticipant.Postcode)) OR (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(newParticipant.PrimaryCareProvider) OR !DbLookupValidationBreastScreening.ValidatePrimaryCareProvider(newParticipant.PrimaryCareProvider)) AND !newParticipant.ToString().StartsWith("ZZZ")

Context.Expression: "It was not possible to determine the BSO dummy practice code for this participant"
